description: This file sets up a knowledge base using PDF documents, vector database, and chunking strategy, then creates an agent to interact with the knowledge base and generate responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF URLs, supporting vector search and chunking.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating its contents.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
